br.com.caelum.vraptor.core

Interface StaticContentHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultStaticContentHandler

    public interface StaticContentHandler
    Handles the content if the request corresponds to static content (like images, CSS, JS and so on).
    Author:
    based on VRaptor2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deferProcessingToContainer(javax.servlet.FilterChain filterChain, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Defer the process to container.
      boolean requestingStaticFile(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Return true if the requested file is a static content, false otherwise.
